# bulma-blog-template
[![Bulma](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bulma-0.9.4-00d1b2?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://bulma.io)

A blog template made in Bulma CSS.

## Scripts

- Popup when link is copied in the navbar
- Go to top button
- Cookies notification
